Question: The family finally settled in Piedmont, California, where this person attended Piedmont Junior High School.
Hints: This person starred in the thriller Escape from Alcatraz in 1979, the last of his films to be directed by Don Siegel.
In preparation for filming this person rarely uses storyboards for developing the layout of a shooting schedule.
Governor Schwarzenegger appointed this person to the California Film Commission in April 2004.
